Class SpatialDbContentHandler

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    URIContent, Action, GoTo, Visibility, Visibility2, FOVFilter.Filterable, ILocation, VisibilityListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FalconViewContentHandler, GeoJSONContentHandler, GMLContentHandler, GpxContentHandler, KmlContentHandler, MvtContentHandler, ShapefileContentHandler
    public abstract class SpatialDbContentHandler
extends FeatureDbContentHandler
    Abstract handler for spatial feature databases with a specific set of feature set IDs (KML, GPX, SHP)
